page.title: 05Greatworth Primary School
page.content: The education of the children within our area at a primary level is catered for by the Primary School at Greatworth. There are seventy two children on roll at present and they are taught by four full time teachers. The children are organised into classes according to their age. The age range is from 4+ _ 11 years. Development of the school building has recently taken place with remodelling of part of the original classroom taking place along with additional practical facilities being built. Transport is provided for the children from Marston St Lawrence who are brought to the school by bus in the morning and taken home in a taxi when school closes at 3.45pm.
